title: Enhance smart-bootstrap with two-step processing
description: Adapt belief tracker's two-step pipeline: Step 1 generates clarification questions and identifies assumptions from spec; Step 2 processes responses and makes confident template selection with full rationale.
notes: Improves accuracy of template selection and project setup through assumption validation and confidence-based decision making.
completion_notes: Enhanced smart-bootstrap.md with two-phase processing: Phase 1 analyzes spec and extracts assumptions with confidence levels, generating only critical clarification questions. Phase 2 processes responses, validates assumptions, and makes high-confidence decisions. Created two-step-processing.md reference documenting the complete framework. Integrated with decision logging for full traceability.
